title: Mobility of Soil-Biodegradable Nanoplastics in Unsaturated Porous Media Affected by Protein-Corona
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00140K, Paper
Yingxue Yu, Odeta Qafoku, Libor Kovarik, Anton F. Astner, Douglas Gordon Hayes, Markus Flury
Soil-biodegradable plastic has been increasingly used as mulches in agriculture, which provides not only agronomical benefits but also in-situ disposal and biodegradation options. However, soil-biodegradable plastic mulches inevitably fragment into...
